title: RIOT WAS HACKED!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
body:
Check support forums. Stop posting you cannot log in.
THIS IS WHY!!!

Damn people support should be the first place you always look. Not general / miscellaneous.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}  Now I know why so many rage at people in this game. Take a donkey to water....

replies.body:
Hey there,

On behalf of the moderation team I apologise for all the spam that's been occurring lately, a permanent solution is looking like a possibility in the near future, however I cannot promise anything.

To put your concerns to rest, nothing has been "Hacked", as many others have said, these are simply spam posts being made with NO_SUMMONER accounts.

That's not a hack, that's just some rando spamming...

Anyone could do it...

Where did you read they were hacked? Sources?

Just because there is a spam bot in one part of these forums doesn't mean the entire oce server was hacked.
Yeah looks like some korean casino site hacked it.
